entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [9.0-preview.4] Failed tests not reported to the console in CI #41299
  • Failed to create a 6.0 project with error "error NU1102: Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref with version (= 6.0.32)" After installing the June service .net 8.0 sdk #41297

Closed

  • MSBuild 17.9.4 no longer reports code style errors in build #39142
  • Add `dotnet nuget push --skip-duplicates` synonym for `--skip-duplicate` #41289
  • Add `dotnet nuget push --dry-run` #41284
  • [Pipelines] Failed to Sync VMR Due to R2R Patch #41285
  • Should netstandard2.0 library publish trim packages? #1855
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Removes problematic system.text.json switches #41322
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41320
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add implementation of Aspire service #41319
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • remove installer from version file #41316
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Import StaticWebAssets SDK only for browser-wasm #41306
    Area-WasmSdk
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Use a more reasonable timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #41294
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Increment branding to allow for razor hotfix #41287
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make SDK produced template nupkgs lowercase #41242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delete src/SourceBuild/patches/fsharp/0001-fix-fsharp-r2r-rid.patch #41298
    Area-VMR

Updated

  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2464403 #41254
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use version comparison function #41102
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41278
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
